original_text: So the men Moses had sent to explore the land, who returned and made the whole community grumble against him by spreading a bad report about it—
korean_text: 모세의 보냄을 받고 땅을 정탐하고 돌아와서 그 땅을 악평하여 온 회중이 모세를 원망하게 한 사람

sentences.original_text: So the men Moses had sent to explore the land
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 모세가 땅을 정탐하라고 보냈던 사람들이

sentences.original_text: who returned and made the whole community grumble against him
sentences.korean_translation: 돌아와서 온 공동체가 그에게 불평하게 하였으니

sentences.original_text: by spreading a bad report about it
